metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Blushing Mermaid - he comments on various states of the city.

0.speaker: Grimbus
0.text: Oh, it did sound a touch rowdy inside. I hope everyone is all right.
0.context: NodeContext: there was a fight inside, and while he's curious he's absolutely not going to go and check

1.speaker: Grimbus
1.text: I - I mistook you for someone else, don't mind me! Have a pleasant day!
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation drop because an article at Baldur's MouthNodeContext: a little awkward and scared

2.speaker: Grimbus
2.text: The drinks are a little peculiar, but the bosun assured me that I'll get used to the taste. I recommend the ale.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the AbsoluteNodeContext: Absolute hipster here, tyring out the 'pirate' life (the bosun is also messing with him  and has served him expired booze)

3.speaker: Grimbus
3.text: Treacherous tidings are afoot - have you heard about the Steel Watchers? Apparently they're malfunctioning!
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Steel Watchers disabledNodeContext: worried

4.speaker: Grimbus
4.text: It's funny, I was reading the most awful things in the paper the other day, about these scoundrels running amok, and you remind me... Oh dear.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation drop because an article at Baldur's MouthNodeContext: realises player is one of the people he's read about in the paper - horror

5.speaker: Grimbus
5.text: I hope the Watchers are repaired soon. They're a touch intimidating, but I did feel rather safe with them about.
5.context: InternalNodeContext: Steel Watchers disabledNodeContext: worried

6.speaker: Grimbus
6.text: This place is jolly good, isn't it? Real sense of the genuine - the authentic.
6.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the AbsoluteNodeContext: Absolute hipster here, tyring out the 'pirate' life

7.speaker: Grimbus
7.text: How can you stand there when this city's hope has crumbled? Gortash is dead... We are doomed.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Players kill GortashNodeContext: genuinely upset, he's a gortash fanboy

8.speaker: Grimbus
8.text: Wondrous news - Baldur's Gate has a new duke! Gortash will do marvellously, don't you think?
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.NodeContext: relieved, he loves the city and is a big fan of gortash

9.speaker: Grimbus
9.text: I say, I've heard nothing but wondrous things about good souls like yourself in the paper. Keep up the good work!
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's MouthNodeContext: cheerful, bit awkward

10.speaker: Grimbus
10.text: Forgive me - I don't mean to be melancholic, but I was sure Gortash was the answer to, well, everything. Without him...
10.context: InternalNodeContext: Players kill GortashNodeContext: genuinely upset, he's a gortash fanboy

11.speaker: Grimbus
11.text: I daresay you've inspired me to pick up a spot of adventuring myself.
11.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's MouthNodeContext: cheerful (though he would make a terrible adventurer)

12.speaker: Grimbus
12.text: I had the joy of meeting Duke Gortash once. Well, I saw the back of his head as he passed in a carriage. But he had the most grandiose air.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.NodeContext: fanboying a bit about gortash
